sentences: Rohkem kui kaks tundi öösel oled sa üksi.
Olen alati kahtlenud, et keegi oleks saanud eksistentsiaalselt rahulolev üksi.
context: 'üksi' is an adverb in Estonian meaning alone or solitary. It can also describe a feeling of loneliness when used contextually and often refers to being by oneself without company, whether physically or emotionally.
